item.title: Integrating Suboptimal Human Knowledge with Hierarchical Reinforcement Learning for Large-Scale Multiagent Systems
item.description: Hierarchical Human Knowledge-guided MARL (hhk-MARL) framework accelerates large-scale multi-agent training by integrating suboptimal human knowledge, significantly improving performance and scalabilit…
